recommendations.recommendation: Resolve the connection error preventing website analysis.  This is critical before any other SEO work can be effectively implemented.

Create compelling and informative content for all pages, focusing on Tesla's unique selling propositions (e.g., sustainability, technology, performance).  Target keywords relevant to the target audience's interests (electric vehicles, renewable energy, etc.). Aim for a minimum of 300 words per page.
Implement a mobile-friendly design for Tesla.com. This is crucial for user experience and search engine ranking, especially given the target audience's tech-savviness and reliance on mobile devices.
Add title tags to all pages, incorporating relevant keywords and accurately reflecting the page's content.  These should be concise and compelling to encourage clicks from search results.
Write unique and engaging meta descriptions for all pages, highlighting key features and benefits to improve click-through rates from search results.
Create and submit a robots.txt file to control which pages search engine crawlers can access. This ensures efficient crawling and prevents indexing of unwanted pages.
Generate and submit a sitemap.xml file to help search engines discover and index all important pages on Tesla.com, improving crawl efficiency and discoverability.
Add H1 headings to all pages, clearly summarizing the main topic and using relevant keywords.  This improves page structure and readability for both users and search engines.
Implement schema markup (e.g., Product, Organization, LocalBusiness) to enhance search engine understanding of Tesla's products and services, improving visibility in search results.

Conduct a comprehensive keyword research study focusing on terms related to electric vehicles, renewable energy, and Tesla's specific products and services. Use this research to inform content creation and on-page optimization.

Build high-quality backlinks from reputable websites in the automotive, technology, and sustainability industries. Focus on earning links from authoritative sources to improve Tesla.com's domain authority and search engine rankings.

backlinks.note: Backlink data requires third-party API integration

social_signals.note: Social signal data requires third-party API integration
